title: Shadowheart
content: from the prisoner. Take Shadowheart, Lae'zel and Astarion to the chicken chase area. Talk to Shadowheart's area dialogue prompt and agree with her to prioritise Halsin With Speak to Animals and while playing Chicken Chase. Convince the Owlbear to help you win. Win in Chicken Chase, convince Krolla to give your money using illithid powers, Invite the Owlbear cub to the camp (Happens in the Goblin Camp and you must not kill the Owlbear in the Cave) When Krolla refuses to give your winnings for Ch
